content:
Hi, I've been trying to install the dev support for to setup the VS Code environment. However, attempting to install rls leads to:

$ rustc --version
rustc 1.54.0-nightly (657bc0188 2021-05-31)

$ rustup component add rls-preview rust-analysis rust-src --toolchain nightly
error: component 'rls' for target 'x86_64-apple-darwin' is unavailable for download for channel 'nightly'

Any idea whether this is something temporary or whether there is no Mac support for rls. Thanks
It is temporary. The status can be seen at https://rust-lang-nursery.github.io/rust-toolstate/. (the status only tracks linux and windows, but it is mostly the same for macos)
You might also want to try rust-analyzer
